sentences.en: And clashes erupted once again outside the Polytechnic.
sentences.cn: 此外,在理工大学墙外又一次爆发冲突.

sentences.en: Bank Polytechnic in London students refused to come forward to receive awards from her.
sentences.cn: 伦敦南班克工艺学校的学生拒绝接受她颁发的奖状.

sentences.en: California Polytechnic State University ( Cal Poly ) was founded in 1901.
sentences.cn: 加洲洲立综合科技大学 ( CalPoly ) 成立于1901.

sentences.en: I'm Tyler Hinman here at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute in Troy, New York.
sentences.cn: 我是泰勒·希曼, 来自纽约特洛伊的壬色列理工学院.

sentences.en: In 1964 he graduated from Donetsk Polytechnic Institute.
sentences.cn: 在1964年,毕业于顿涅茨克综合技术学院.

sentences.en: Polytechnic college , majoring in power system automation.
sentences.cn: 主要从事电力系统自动化教学与研究.

sentences.en: Polytechnic lecturers have asked for 12.5 per cent, a claim sure to be laughed out of court.
sentences.cn: 理工学校的讲师要求12.5%，这一要求肯定不会予以考虑。

sentences.en: Polytechnic University hotel school will be able to, ah, single money will be 100.
sentences.cn: 理工大学校内宾馆就可以啊, 单间也就100块钱.

sentences.en: She was trained as a teacher at Manchester Polytechnic.
sentences.cn: 她在曼彻斯特工艺专科学校就读,准备毕业后做老师.

sentences.en: The increasing of books polytechnic school brings the heavy work of inquiring and managing.
sentences.cn: 随着高职院校图书资源的增多,对其查询与管理工作变得日益繁重,本文选用.

sentences.en: The Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute ( RPI ) Incubator Program, an industry pioneer, is marking 25 years in operation.
sentences.cn: ROI 研究所孵化器项目, 是本行最早的先锋, 已经操作了25年.

sentences.en: There are lots of CWISs ( Campus - Wide Information Systems ) running in tjpu ( TianJin PolyTechnic University ) nowadays.
sentences.cn: 天津工业大学在校园网络环境下已建立了多个信息系统,为学校领导、各部门及全校教师、学生提供多种服务.

sentences.en: There is going to be a polytechnic exhibition tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 明天会有一场工艺品展出.

sentences.en: Today more than 30,000 students are enrolled in the polytechnic.
sentences.cn: 现在理工学院有三万多名学生;系里全日制的学生已超过三千五百名.

sentences.en: Your trainee will acquire polytechnic training.
sentences.cn: 你方受训人员将受到综合技术培训.

trans.tran_en: a word used in the names of high schools or colleges in the US, where you can study technical or scientific subjects
